name: night houses
description:
Short game exploring the commons, housing and folklore during the enclosure period in england scotland and wales. Various snippets of stories taken from Colin Ward's Cotters and Squatters.

Play using arrows keys or swiping the screen to move the character

Credits: 

 This game is inspired by/ a mini adaptation of Colin Ward’s book 'Cotters and Squatters' on the same topic and most of the text is quoted directly from it.

Music is 'Laps' by Blear House available at under Attribution-NonCommercial 4.0 International License at https://www.freemusicarchive.org/music/Blear_Moon/Fallow/Blear_Moon-Laps

Cover image is a modified version of: Tŷ Hyll - The Ugly House
